column4: Hey guys, I have a question. I'm tryin to install ubuntu onto my old desktop but while installing the base system, it says that the kernal-linux 366 (i think, i restarted) any suggestions on what to do to solve this?
hard to say. It could be a conflict with hardware (one possibility i've heard of). noting the errors would really help :)
I've had probs like that with corrupt discs, yea.
